text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the triangle $ABC$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the triangle $ABC$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AH$ is $4$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $6$ units.
The length of the line $HC$ is the same as the length of the line $BH$.
Point $H$ lies on the line connecting $C$ and $B$.
The line $AH$ is perpendicular to the line $BC$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $AH$, forming the triangle $ABC$.
